message: I'm feeling generous, but time is money Alice! Let's close this deal.
Come on, Bob, it's a good deal!
Alice, this is a fair deal. I'm taking a hit from inflation, let's wrap this up.
You're losing value, I'm being reasonable.
Alice, let's stop wasting time.  A 50/50 split is the only fair option at this point.
Your 50/50 was close, but not quite there.
Alice, I'm taking a significant loss here. This is my final offer, take it or leave it.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm still waiting for a good deal.
Alice, this is ridiculous. I'm offering you more than I am getting. Don't be greedy, or we both lose!
I'm not being greedy, I'm being patient. You're running out of time.
